author: Lauren Moraski CBS News
title: â€‹Kaley Cuoco looks to "next chapter" after Ryan Sweeting split
text:
Kaley Cuoco is feeling a lot of love from her fans.
The star of "The Big Bang Theory" recently split from her husband Ryan Sweeting after 20 months of marriage. Since the announcement last month , Cuoco has received an outpouring of support from fans and loved ones.
27 Photos Splits Breaking up is hard to do, especially when you're in the public eye
"I'm feeling completely overwhelmed with the outpouring of kindness and support from the people that surround me and from those I have never even met," she wrote. "I want you to know, I read all your comments and your sweet words have touched me deeply. I'm incredibly grateful for all your love as I start this next chapter in my life."
Cuoco and Sweeting, both 29, married in a New Year's Eve ceremony in 2013. They have no children together.
I'm feeling completely overwhelmed with the outpouring of kindness and support from the people that surround me and from those I have never even met. I want you to know, I read all your comments and your sweet words have touched me deeply. I'm incredibly grateful for all your love as I start this next chapter in my life ðŸ’— ðŸ’—
A photo posted by @normancook on Oct 20, 2015 at 8:48pm PDT
Cuoco's publicist said that the couple had mutually agreed to end their marriage.
"Kaley Cuoco and Ryan Sweeting have mutually decided to end their marriage," Cuoco's rep said. "They ask for privacy at this time. No further statement will be issued regarding this matter."
